articles.author: Mark Cannizzaro
articles.title: Phil Mickelson withdraws from PGA Championship - New York Post
articles.description: The PGA of America announced Friday afternoon that Mickelson will not play in the major championship next week at Southern Hills in Tulsa, Okla.
articles.content:
Phil Mickelson wont defend his historic PGA Championship title next week at Southern Hills.
The 2021 PGA Champion, who hasn’t played competitively in more than three months and has been in exile ove… [+2534 chars]

articles.title: ‘U.S. consumer is alive and well’ — Affirm CEO says market turbulence has no impact on business - CNBC
articles.description: Americans are shopping and buying and "they're paying their loans, at least to Affirm quite well," Affirm's Max Levchin said Thursday evening.
articles.content:
Affirm Holdings Chairman and CEO Max Levchin told CNBC that despite the market's poor performance this year, U.S. consumers and Affirm's customers are spending healthily.
